Summary I am Senior SCM Planning & Manufacturing Consultant within IBM GBS DC in Lithuania.  
 
I have skills on SAP Production Planning applications (PP and PP-PI) with specific interest in material and production master data management (MDM), MRP, Material Management (MM), PP and Execution (production/process orders). As well I have an experience with production planning (mid-term and short-term planning and scheduling), MES and FG and NTM WM systems. 
 
Currently I am working as PP-PI consultant in the Regional SCM team in Abbott Laboratories company in Symphony SAP global template roll-out in Europe (UK, Ireland, Germany) and US. 
 
My previous experience consists on: 
- Engineer to Release Regional team consultant in Caterpillar Inc. company (MACH 1 SAP global template roll-out in Europe) 
- SAP PP Global team consultant in BAT company (One SAP global template design) 
- SAP Demand to Build Regional process lead in Estee Lauder company (the global template roll-out in Germany) 
- SAP Manufacturing (PP, PM, QM) team lead in BAT company (the global template roll-out in Uzbekistan)  
- SAP PP consultant in BAT (British American Tobacco) company (the global template roll-out in Ukraine) 
- SAP Production Planning and Execution team lead in PML company (the global template roll-out) 
- leading in others non-SAP global and local applications development and implementations (WMS, MES, STP (Short Term Planning)) in PML (Philip Morris Lithuania) company. 
 
My career background consists of working with supply chain management (SCM) applications.

Summary Automotive, chemical, consumer goods, food and beverage, along with medial devices, these are industries that I have worked with. The key has been to develop the business processes that drive them and establish process points where data that informs them is collected. When that is done teach them what they have and how to grow, to improve, to succeed with the process and information that has been started. The enterprises have been midsize to large companies. The challenges have been from: initiating a planning process, develop a costing process, complete redesign of the SKU identification and process, determine where and what needs to be collected, on to assisting them with determining what their core competency is. I consider this my expertise, determine where and what an Enterprise, and Entity is, and work with in that organization to refine, design and implement processes and solutions.
